metadata.title: CVE-2020-17508 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The ATS ESI plugin has a memory disclosure vulnerability. If you are running the plugin please upgrade. Apache Traffic Server versions 7.0.0 to 7.1.11 and 8.0.0 to 8.1.0 are affected.

notes.note: msalvatore> vulnerable code in xenial is included in "experimental plugins", which are built.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.1.1+ds-1').
